title: Starfighter Piloting
wikitext:
'''Starfighter Piloting'''

'''''Time Taken''': ''One round or longer.

'''''Specializations''': ''Type or model starfighter — ''Xwing, TIE/ln, TIE interceptor, Z-95 Headhunter.''

''Starfighter piloting is ''used for all combat starfighters, including X-wings, Y-wings, A-wings, and TIE fighters.

''Starfighter piloting ''can be used for a starship dodge — a "reaction skill" — to avoid enemy fire.
